channel.title: BBMIP updates on hold until further notice.
channel.description: Hi all. Been a rough weekend for me. I had a massive heart attack Friday at work and almost died (apparently did for a short period of time). I spent the weekend in ICU and now am home and lucky to be alive. After having to deal with a few of the attitudes of the regulars on the forums I have decided to put my updates on hold. I don't have the energy right now and I don't need the stress of dealing with people here as well. So.....sorry if your offended....or sad at the news (or happy). Maybe these will continue in the future or maybe they will just stop with part 5.

item.title: BBMIP updates on hold until further notice.
item.dc:creator: bkdale86
item.description:
Flatline:

[COLOR=‘green’]Ok, Ok, I get the picture, rather than just not posting you’re going to keep on posting garbage until I close it. Sorry Brian, was leaving the decision up to you but they’ve forced my hand.

It’s No big deal. Probably should have just deleted the whole thing lol.

Read full topic

item.title: BBMIP updates on hold until further notice.
item.dc:creator: Ronster
item.description:
bkdale86:

I was incredibly unlucky and incredibly lucky all at once. If it had happened the next day I would have been out alone in the Smokies hiking and I would have been found a week later dead.

That does not even bear thinking about I love walking and hiking too. Thank God that never happened.

Read full topic

item.title: BBMIP updates on hold until further notice.
item.dc:creator: Ronster
item.description:
My god really sorry to hear about this news. Rest up take it easy.

Listen to the experts, and I hope everything is ok for you.

I want to thank you again for sharing your great work even if it discontinues from this point. I am sure nobody will be upset if the updates stop here because you have problems to deal with don’t worry about that for a second.

Read full topic
